name: Didier Remy
content: Didier Remy Didier Rémy Senior researcher (directeur de recherche) at INRIA Paris in the Cambium project-team. Google my site: Contacting me Publications Teaching Hacks WhizzyTeX Interests Type systems and type inference, object-oriented languages, concurrent and distributed languages, semantics of programming languages Foundations and design of the OCaml language (at INRIA). See my publications, talks, and projects [ modules | abbreviations | disornamentation | ornaments | unique inhabitants | GADTs | coercions | MLF ]. Award Sep 2013: I am deeply honored to receive the ACM SIGPLAN Most Influential ICFP Paper Award jointly with Didier Le Botlan for our ICFP 2003 paper MLF:Raising ML to the power of System F. Hacks Latex packages: locallabel, mathpartir, excercise, proof, copytofile. ifjobname. boolean. reversion. BibTeX: non invasive printing of URLs in references.
